Reviews.Title: Grrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrreat product
Reviews.Author: Ignacio
Reviews.Content: This is straight on a great computer. Many might complain about a slow HDD speed, apparent "too heavy" characteristic, etc, but this computer makes up for it in great and many ways. If you worry about speed, it is only a real problem if you have to boot something immediately (I recommend having it always on sleep or hibernation- there's always a plug nearby where to charge the poor battery); if you think it's too heavy, it is time to check a doctor or hit the gym because you are too weak. Great sophisticated look, fabulous screen, huge memory. Only flaw is not having a number keyboard. The Windows 8 problem is only temporary: after a while you get used to it and it becomes very helpful, but if it doesn't work for you, there are solutions out there that will give some previous Windows OS functions to your 8 (like a Start button on your desktop).

Reviews.Title: Good Product. But Heavy
Reviews.Author: rasheed girvan
Reviews.Content: Very good computer. I love the processing power and the backlit keys. Battery doesn't seem to last very long though.This is a rather heavy laptop. Not ideal for carrying around everyday.

ProductInfo.Features:
3rd Gen Intel® CoreTM i7-3632QM (6MB cache, up to 3.2Ghz)
15.6" Full HD Widescreen (1900 x 1080, 1080p), Genuine Windows 8® Consumer (English) (64-bit)
8GB Dual Channel DDR3 (1600MHz), 750GB SATA (5400 RPM), 6-Cell Li-Ion Battery
8X Tray Load CD/DVD Burner (Dual Layer DVD+R), backlit Keyboard
AMD RadeonTM HD 7730M 2GB, 8-in-1 Media Card Reader, Bluetooth
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron Special Edition i15Rse 15-Inch Laptop - Intel Core i7-3632QM / 8GB DDR3 Memory / 750GB Hard Drive / 2GB AMD Radeon HD 7730M / 1920 x 1080 1080p / Stealth Black Anodized Aluminum
